product_name: Royal Robbins Field Guide Vest - Men's
long_description: The Royal Robbins Field Guide Vest doesn't skimp when it comes to performance. It has 17 pockets for all your essentials, and is made with a quick-drying, sun-protective nylon fabric. 2-ply nylon fabric is very lightweight yet still provides UPF 30 sun protection; fabric dries quickly when wet. Includes 13 exterior pockets and 4 interior pockets to stow all your trail and travel essentials. Padding at the neck and shoulders improves comfort. Ventilation in back helps keep you cool; mesh lining helps move moisture. 2-way zip closure down the front. Royal Robbins Field Guide Vest has a relaxed fit.
short_description: The Royal Robbins Field Guide Vest doesn't skimp when it comes to performance. It has 17 pockets for all your essentials, and is made with a quick-drying, sun-protective nylon fabric.
